name: Akin
description: In this puzzle, you only have to draw one continuous line. There are 96 puzzles on "Normal"-mode and 96 puzzles in "Time"-mode. Each puzzles can have many different solutions. This is game is Steamworks integrated with achivements, badges, trading cards and more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with 512Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual Core processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with 512Mb DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

reviews.review_text: A rather enjoyable puzzle game that boasts a simple UI and many levels. Although it looks and feels like it should be a mobile game, it works well on a PC. Would recommend.

Simple Puzzle game. For me it was the music that made it more enjoyable. It changes up every few puzzles, and you feel inclined to finish a set.   I liked that you can only move to a color that you are changing with....you can get stuck if you pick the wrong color...or turned an object that blocks the path. Easy to retry the puzzle as well.  Played only on Normal...it might be harder on Timed Trials. Well worth, if you want just play a chill relaxing puzzle.
got this game for free from someone free giveaway steam game.. good puzzle strategy game fast gameplay at some scene can make my brain stuck moving haha overall 7.8/10 ratings
